self.title: CDISC Questionnaire Voice Handicap Index Test Name Terminology

name: Voice Handicap Index Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire Voice Handicap Index Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Voice Handicap Index Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - I tend to avoid groups of people because of my voice.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Avoid People Because of My Voice
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-Avoid People Because of My Voice
synonyms: VHI01-Avoid People Because of My Voice

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - I try to change my voice to sound different.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Change Voice to Sound Different

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - The clarity of my voice is unpredictable.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Clarity of Voice is Unpredictable

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - I feel embarrassed when people ask me to repeat.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Embarrassed People Ask Me Repeat

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - My family has difficulty hearing me when I call them throughout the house.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Family Has Difficulty Hearing Me

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - I feel annoyed when people ask me to repeat.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Feel Annoyed People Ask Me Repeat
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-Feel Annoyed People Ask Me Repeat
synonyms: VHI01-Feel Annoyed People Ask Me Repeat

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - I feel as though I have to strain to produce voice.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Have to Strain to Produce Voice
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-Have to Strain to Produce Voice
synonyms: VHI01-Have to Strain to Produce Voice

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - I am ashamed of my voice problem.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - I Am Ashamed of My Voice Problem
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-I Am Ashamed of My Voice Problem
synonyms: VHI01-I Am Ashamed of My Voice Problem

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - I run out of air when I talk.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - I Run Out of Air When I Talk
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-I Run Out of Air When I Talk
synonyms: VHI01-I Run Out of Air When I Talk

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - I feel left out of conversations because of my voice.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Left Out of Conversation Because Voice
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-Left Out of Conversation B/c Voice
synonyms: VHI01-Left Out of Conversation B/c Voice

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - I am less outgoing because of my voice problem.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Less Outgoing Because of Voice Problem
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-Less Outgoing B/c of Voice Problem
synonyms: VHI01-Less Outgoing B/c of Voice Problem

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - My voice is worse in the evening.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - My Voice is Worse in the Evening
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-My Voice is Worse in the Evening
synonyms: VHI01-My Voice is Worse in the Evening

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - My voice problem upsets me.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - My Voice Problem Upsets Me

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - My voice sounds creaky and dry.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - My Voice Sounds Creaky and Dry
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-My Voice Sounds Creaky and Dry
synonyms: VHI01-My Voice Sounds Creaky and Dry

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - Part I-F subtotal.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Part I-F Subtotal

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - Part II-P subtotal.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Part II-P Subtotal

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - Part III-E subtotal.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Part III-E Subtotal

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - People ask, "What's wrong with your voice?"
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - People Ask What's Wrong With Voice
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-People Ask What's Wrong w/ Voice
synonyms: VHI01-People Ask What's Wrong w/ Voice

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - People have difficulty understanding me in a noisy room.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - People Difficulty Understanding Me

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - I find other people don't understand my voice problem.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - People Don't Understand Voice Problem

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - People seem irritated with my voice.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - People Seem Irritated With My Voice
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-People Seem Irritated w/ My Voice
synonyms: VHI01-People Seem Irritated w/ My Voice

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - People ask me to repeat myself when speaking face-to-face.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Repeat Myself Speak Face-to-Face

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - The sound of my voice varies throughout the day.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Sound Voice Varies Throughout Day

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - I speak with friends, neighbors, or relatives less often because of my voice.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Speak Friends Less Often Because Voice
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-Speak Friends Less Often B/c Voice
synonyms: VHI01-Speak Friends Less Often B/c Voice

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - I am tense when talking to others because of my voice.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Tense Talking to Others Because Voice
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-Tense Talking to Others B/c Voice
synonyms: VHI01-Tense Talking to Others B/c Voice

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - Total score.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Total Score

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - I use a great deal of effort to speak.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Use Great Deal of Effort to Speak
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-Use Great Deal of Effort to Speak
synonyms: VHI01-Use Great Deal of Effort to Speak

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - I use the phone less often than I would like to.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Use Phone Less Often

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - My voice difficulties restrict my personal and social life.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Voice Difficulties Restrict Life

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - My voice "gives out" on me in the middle of speaking.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Voice Gives Out on Me Speaking
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-Voice Gives Out on Me Speaking
synonyms: VHI01-Voice Gives Out on Me Speaking

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - My voice makes it difficult for people to hear me.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Voice Makes Difficult to Hear Me
terms.submissionValue: VHI01-Voice Makes Difficult to Hear Me
synonyms: VHI01-Voice Makes Difficult to Hear Me

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - My voice makes me feels handicapped.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Voice Makes Me Feel Handicapped

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - My voice makes me feel incompetent.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Voice Makes Me Feel Incompetent

terms.definition: Voice Handicap Index - My voice problem causes me to lose income.
terms.preferredTerm: VHI - Voice Problem Causes Lose Income
